report.name: synthCoutProj

dataSource.name: Q_REQ_PRINCIPALE
dataSource.select: SELECT DISTINCT tmp.clicode CLICODE, tmp.clisigle DEPARTEMENT, tmp.typedp TYPE_DP, tmp.CODCAMO CODCAMO, tmp.ANNEE ANNEE, tmp.dpcode DPCODE, tmp.libdp LIBDP, tmp.NOTIFIE_MAT NOTIFIE_MAT, tmp.NOTIFIE_LOG NOTIFIE_LOG, tmp.NOTIFIE_MOB NOTIFIE_MOB, tmp.REALISE_MAT REALISE_MAT, tmp.REALISE_LOG REALISE_LOG, tmp.REALISE_MOB REALISE_MOB, tmp.CONSO CONSO, tmp.BUDGET FROM tmp_synthcoutproj tmp WHERE tmp.numseq=:P_NUMSEQ

textSegment.string: En coût complet (Force de travail + environnement)
